title: OpenGL Demo Framework
description: Framework for testing and demonstrating different OpenGL rendering techniques including a model loader, terrain renderer and interactive components with ImGui.

title: Interactive Geometry Remeshing
description: A Python implementation of Pierre Alliez, Mark Meyer, and Mathieu Desbrun's research paper "Interactive Geometry Remeshing."

title: Creativity Support Tools
description: Portfolio of work done for my class, CSC485E; "Topics in Systems: Creativity Support Tools." Features a series of projects based around tangible user interfaces and supporting creative processes.
